nodes.text: The Zlagfiend was a predatory creature that the Trandoshans hunted. The Trandoshan cameraman Lug collected the teeth of slain Zlagfiend. In 5 ABY, he gave the tooth of a Zlagfiend to a young Kupohan New Republic soldier named Rorith Khadur as a token during the fighting on the planet Nag Ubdur.
